attributes.action: Repatriate the British nationals stranded in India
attributes.additional_details:
There are hundreds that have made themselves heard, I assume hundreds more who are also stranded, who face dangerous situations here in india.
Hotels/hostels do not want to accept bookings from foreigners, people are being forced out of accommodation. There are British people who are elderly, on life supporting medication, people who are alone in an increasingly hostile environment, we all want to get home and cannot due to restrictions.
We understand we need to comply with local government procedures but we cannot do this and remain safe.
attributes.background: We want you to safely return British nationals to the UK from India amidst the Covid 19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
